title.label: Its rigged and please remove the feature

content.label: So if you win to much it will make your elixir go slow and put you with higher level players and it makes it unfair if you make it legit we won’t quit. So remove that feature I will play it allot more. Besides that one thing it amazing and you should continue working on it. Right now because it’s rigged it a step down from clash of clans. If you remove it many players with come back to it also making it if you spend more you make more money that’s not gonna work for many people. so make the game legit and make the purchases like donations and not scam some random kids.
I have spent three years on the game and i keep on loosing to level 10s with all max level troops that only have a year if you dont pay to win you wont make it far

It’s been clear for awhile that this game has had some player vs player balancing issues. I’ve been playing Royale on and off for a few years most of my time on it was when it was first released. To this day I still think there should have been a level cap based upon people’s lvl’s, like it does not make sense for a lvl 10 to have maxed cards playing against other lvl 10’s it’s simply ridiculous and makes for an unfair play style which contributes a lot to the new and improved clan wars. I think war just like the challenges should at least have a lvl cap, or do what clash does and calculate war weight with each deck. Taking in account the lvl of both the player and the cards in the deck. Also, I think this type of war weight calculation should be put into multiplayer. As a lvl 12 I see lvl 10’s and 11’s with more maxed cards than I have, which is because when I was lvl 10 I upgraded more cards? Therefore have more xp? I understand that tower health goes up but higher cars lvl is not a fair trade off. It just doesn’t make sense to me and overall makes for an unfair play style. 

Also I can’t believe after all these years the developers never put an option to take off the level cap in friendly battles. I think since there is no option for lvl cap in regular multiplayer battles then people should have the option to practice without it on. 

I guess an overall solve to this would be for an option of lvl capped cards in multiplayer battles. Just like another gameplay option, that allows for trophy progression but at a fair play after lvl 9 is reached.
Clash Royale is a really great game. It is super fun. Also great prizes
After you win the game is like. Nah b you can’t win more. And pairs your with decks that are so trash and apparently counter yours. Crappy game fix it

This is a fantastic game and keeps you busy with harder players. You can play with friends and family competitively while you proceed to become better at the game. Clash royal was made by Supercell and other games they make are just as awesome as this one.

In 2016 when this game came out it quickly became one of my favorites, but over the years especially in these last 2 the dev team has gone from supporting the regular community to mostly paying attention to the crl which is such a small and in my experience a rather sh**y part of the community with annoying tryhards and pay to wins. I’ve played other games like lately and what I feel they do better is instead of just taking into account play and win rates of cards/units, they take into account the damage the cards/units actually do in game, for example if a musketeer is played 2 times or a wizard is played once the wizard can do over a thousand damage cause of his massive damage and splash, but the musketeers might not though she is cheaper to play and is supposed to be one of the strongest single target anti air units, but due to the fact that she was played more she is in higher consideration for a nerf, so things like that should be used when analyzing the data and buffing and nerfing cards, sadly that hasn’t been happening.
The amount of lag makes you hate the game.

Due to this problem I have lost enough trophies to bring me down an arena. I can’t even have a fun game because I can’t find people my level. Please fix this and make the game fun and fair!!!!

Game has such potential but if your not ready to sink $100’s in to the game you don’t stand a chance. They should change there name to greed.

I just started playing again and it is very disappointing, I tried searching for clans with advanced criteria and there’s no search button, my criteria didn’t not apply.

It seems the developers have made this to be a cash cow for them. The only way you can be any good is to dump a boat load of money into it. In order to upgrade your cards you need to have some serious cash.

You’ll have fun until you get to tower level 9-10, from there everyone pretty much has maxed or cards 1-2 levels above your’s (at Masters league which I’m in, it makes a huge difference).

Have this expectation or you won’t have fun as you progress.
Went to “purchase” a 2 legendary and 2 rare token package at 9PM EST and got 2 epic and 2 common tokens instead. Please fix. Thank you.

title.label: This is the game for you if....

content.label:
... you’re a coward. Play like a chicken to climb the ladder. Hog, barrel, balloon, graveyard, occasional royal giant or xbow deck sprinkled with a specific sparky or pekka deck. It’s so lame to play against the same 8 decks 90% of the time. This game supports cowardly play style and every deck is effectively the same harassment formula. If you try to be original and make your own deck, expect to lose. You might as well copy a hog deck or one of it’s variants. One star because encouraging this play style and rewarding lack of creativity is a disservice to players.

Also, the challenges are stupid. A recent challenge had a miner deck, which was a disadvantage to anyone who played it. Everyone I played against the had it lost, and I lost every time I had it. It’s great against expensive decks, but it’s definitely the worst in cowards deck challenge or whatever rubbish the recent challenge was.

So this game is everything SuperCell posts on there site that they are Not but all of this happens in this game and they enable it. Follow information is found on there website and I’ll explain where the exact opposite happens in this. “We're all here to enjoy games together. Sometimes that can mean arguing with friends over lost battles or derbies. That's fine, but being abusive towards others drains the fun from the game; When engaging in any kind of in-game communication, we kindly ask that you are respectful of others. This also applies to the language used in your team's name and description (whether it's a Club, Clan, Task Force or Neighbourhood).

Here are a few examples of that we consider inappropriate:

Hate speech, racism and other discriminatory language
Obscene or sexually explicit banter
Threats or harassment
Excessive swearing 
Bullying”
There are 116 emojis to chose from in this game. Originally 4 when they won an award back in 2016 but this game is far from that Now! Players can chose from 8 different emojis to use. Believe me when a lot are used to be sexually explicit, threatening, and used to even bully. If you don’t know what 116 emojis look like or how some could used to be offensive type out 116 different emojis. Or have someone laughing in your face the entire time. That’s fun right? 😂🤣😂

“DON'T BE A CHEAT!

USE OF THIRD PARTY SOFTWARE 

Third party software consists of unapproved apps that manipulate gameplay. By altering game functionality, third party software aims to provide unfair advantages while putting your account and privacy at risk.

Third party software includes:

Hacks, "mods", or programs that unfairly alter game functionality 
"Bots", or gameplay automation services or scripts 
Any other programs that aim to modify or provide unearned.”
Again they are aware that there are cheats out there and do nothing about it. There are A LOT of cheaters in this game. Constantly getting red bars like I have no internet but I’m connected to the internet. You can be in the middle of a battle and your entire WiFi shuts down. How do I know? When it happens my wife’s phone, streaming TV, etc. All stop working at the exact time it happens during the game. To make it more fun if you do not need a chest your elixir will not generate at the same time this is done by SuperCell so they even cheat in the game. There are 99 cards to chose from to make your 8 card battle deck. Yet you constantly will play against the same 16-32 cards based on your deck. PLEASE if you are thinking of getting this game save you TIME and potentially money. You can thank me layer!
